scripts.ci-build: echo "Use this to compile or minify your application"
scripts.ci-integration-test: echo "Test your application and write results in a JUnit format to `s4hana_pipeline/reports/backend-integration/` and coverage in a cobertura format to `s4hana_pipeline/reports/coverage/backend-integration/`"
scripts.ci-backend-unit-test: echo "Test your application and write results in a JUnit format to `s4hana_pipeline/reports/backend-unit/` and coverage in a cobertura format to `s4hana_pipeline/reports/coverage/backend-unit/`"
